pageContext.claim: “Oh, I get it! I am a very good developer, happily living my life, when I see our Country going in the wrong direction (to put it mildly). Against all odds, I decide to run for President & continue to run my business-very legal & very cool, talked about it on the campaign trail. Lightly looked at doing a building somewhere in Russia. Put up zero money, zero guarantees and didn't do the project. Witch Hunt!”
pageContext.analysis: Trump signed a nonbinding agreement in the fall of 2015 to pursue a deal for Trump Moscow. He was continually updated on the project even while he publically denied he didn't have any business ties to Russia. Court documents say the deal was still in progress until just before the Republican National Convention.
